page.title: 20Who collected the data?
page.content: The information for this section was gathered by Ellesmere College. The form 2 (aged 12) and lower sixth form geography sets were involved while additional information was collected by N.R.Panting, who also edited the text. Mr.R.Hampson of Tetchill was especially helpful, providing much information, but several others gave useful assistance. {Form Two} A.Dawson, M.Dunn, J.Edwards, C.Gittins, C.Jefferies, S.Jones, B.McLatchie, P.Mason, S.Jackson, J.Purslow, P.Sands, C.Smyth, E.Upton. {Lower Sixth A.Durnford, N.Harris, H.Saunders, A.Stubbs, P.Sykes, F.Towers, D.Welton C.Williamson. {Sixth} {Master i.c. P.Batho N.R.Panting
